DPRD Subang Soroti Serapan APBD Minim
01 Nov 2019, 09:42 by Ruslan Efendi


DPRD Subang Soroti Serapan APBD Minim

KBRN, Subang : Ketua DPRD Subang Narca Sukanda menyoroti persoalan molornya penerapan APBD, yang berdampak terhadap minimnya serapan anggaran, sehingga terjadinya pengendapan anggaran, sekaligus pelayanan kepada masyarakat pun terhambat.
Narca menyebutkan, ketepatan waktu penyerapan APBD, baru dilaksanakan pada bulan Agustus, yang seharusnya bulan Januari harus sudah diterapkan, untuk setiap program kegiatan.
"Ya paling tidak selambat-lambatnya di bulan April lah, in maj baru dilaksanakan pada bulan Agustus, sehingga terjadi pengendapan anggaran, dan ini patut kita pertanyakan," ujar Narca kepada wartawan di Subang, Jum'at (1/11/2019).
Sementara itu Narca menegaskan, ia tidak ingin APBD tahun 2020 nanti, terjadi adanya keterlambatan itu terulang kembali.
"APBD itu kan sudah di plot sesuai usulannya, tapi kenapa bisa terjadi keterlambatan," imbuhnya.
Narca berharap, penggunaan APBD itu harus tepat waktu, tepat guna dan tepat sasaran, sehingga tidak berimbas terhadap pengurangan APBD di tahun berikutnya.

DPRD Subang Highlights APBD Uptake Uptake
Nov 01 2019, 09:42 by Ruslan Efendi


DPRD Subang Highlights APBD Uptake Uptake

KBRN, Subang: Speaker of the Subang DPRD Narca Sukanda highlighted the issue of the delayed implementation of the APBD, which had an impact on the lack of budget absorption, resulting in budgetary constraints, as well as service to the public being hampered.
Narca said, the timeliness of APBD absorption, was only carried out in August, which should have been implemented in January, for each activity program.
"Yes, at least not later than April, the new maj will be held in August, so that there is a budgetary tackling, and this should be questioned," Narca said to reporters in Subang, Friday (1/11/2019).
Meanwhile Narca stressed that he did not want the 2020 regional budget, the delay would occur again.
"The budget is already plotted according to his proposal, but why can there be a delay," he added.
Narca hopes that the use of the APBD must be timely, appropriate and on target, so that it does not affect the reduction of the next year's budget.
